title: Client issue
body:
Hi,

I have a problem with client(regular not new), so it was working great untill i opened it today, it's so tiny i cant even se anything it went to miniature. I want to know if there is any way to resize it. It's same like if you put box of cigarettes on screen thats how big my client is (login window and game window), i don't have issues in-game works fine.

Any suggestions?
if you don't know what I mean i can post a picture how small it is.

replies.body:
https://gyazo.com/ffdf5a762074d4b880e2c5bed0235ada

here is the picture of client, and thats on laptop

A big part of the issue here might be that you're still on the legacy client somehow.  We've transitioned over to the updated version so it's not going to function anymore.  I suggest grabbing our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and using it to perform a clean reinstall.  This will get you to the current version as well as the resolution.  I hope that helps!

downloaded hextech repair tool, reinstalled game upgraded client.. still same problem :/. 
Could be nvidia geforce experience? because it was auto optimized but I guess thats only ingame..

It's okay, at least now that you're on the updated client I consider that progress made!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can check this out and see if there's anything we can do to help.  Grab the logs from the HRT as well and attach it to your ticket for more context.  We'll see you there!
i've tried (ctrl +) but nothing changes i tried in at client home, after that i clicked play and tried again in the screen that you choose which game mode, but nothing.

Don't mention cigarettes, Graves might relapse.  :P  It sounds like your client is scaled super low.  You should be able to resolve this by holding Ctrl and tapping + on your keyboard.  (Ctrl and +) 

Let me know if that helps!
